scripts.build-bundle-small: export THRESHOLD=8000000 && node script/build-languages.js && browserify lib/franc.js --standalone franc --outfile franc.js
scripts.build-bundle-medium: export THRESHOLD=1000000 && node script/build-languages.js && browserify lib/franc.js --standalone franc --outfile franc-most.js
scripts.build-bundle-large: export THRESHOLD=-1 && node script/build-languages.js && browserify lib/franc.js --standalone franc --outfile franc-all.js
scripts.build-bundle: npm run build-bundle-small && npm run build-bundle-large && npm run build-bundle-medium
scripts.build-mangle: npm run build-mangle-small && npm run build-mangle-medium && npm run build-mangle-large
scripts.build: npm run build-bundle && npm run build-mangle && npm run build-fixtures && npm run build-support
scripts.test: npm run build && npm run lint && npm run test-coverage && npm run test-cli
